Friends

<

UN4YA

The first friend I met when it try to find someone non-OG. Although I found him through a coding Discord server, he doesn't actually know how to code. I think he was just invited there for nothing. He doesn't have any skill in FNAF-related games, but he masters the gameplay of Minecraft. Yeah, we play it in the free time. And the surprising thing is he can have full diamond armor like a week from a season release. What a speedrunner, slow down man!

interseer [formerly: 4unduck]

The unexpected friend I made when I was searching through the official Aternos server. Unlike beepybunny, he lives in the Siberian area near Japan. That tells he is closer to me than beepybunny is. We both knew Jackbox Games when we first met and now he joins UN4YA and I on Minecraft. Aside from the game, we three also played the first You Don't Know Jack game online. Additionally, I also got a lot of Lethal Company stuff that I wanted to learn from him.

Russians really like Lethal Company, huh?

Seft

One of the originals. Not sure when and where I first met them, but they have joined me on a lot of stuff. Non-Binary, so watch out when you use pronouns against them.

beepybunny

One of the originals in my FNAF-Discord experience. I actually didn't talk to him since that time until the seventh day of April 2024. Before that he made a FNAF 2 remake in Retrostudio for multiple players, and before that he made his UCN fangame, Ultimate Survival Night. He also mentions that he lives in the Siberian area near Mongolia. Like 4unduck, he really likes Lethal Company.

This is my main channel created in November 2021. I post random content, but you will find gaming most common. I play FNAF fangames, emulated Mario games, and more if you guys want me to play your recommended games.

A seperate channel where I play games with my friends! We have a lot of fun together, and the nicest thing is we are open to invite one or two of you guys to hop in with us!
